model
Class Board

java.lang.Object
  model.Board

public class Board
extends java.lang.Object

The Board class is a mutable class. The Board class represents the configuration of an antichess board. A Board contains Pieces and Squares. Each Square is mapped to a Piece.

Specification Fields :
boardMap : map //mapping of Squares to Pieces on the Board

movePiece

public void movePiece(Move move)
Performs a Move on the current Board configuration

Parameters:
move - : The Move that is to be performed
Requires:
(move != null)
Effects:
Replaces the Piece at move.getToSquare() with the Piece at move.getFromSquare(), and place an empty Piece at move.getFromSquare(). This also sets the hasMoved field of the Piece originally at move.getFromSquare() to true.

replacePiece

public void replacePiece(Square sq,
                         Piece piece)
Places a given piece at the Square sq

Parameters:
sq - : The Square given
piece - : The Piece to be placed
Requires:
(sq != null) &&

(piece != null)

Effects:
Sets this.boardMap.get(sq) equal to piece. This also sets the hasMoved field of piece to true.
